text: Agra is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Varese in the Italian region of Lombardy. As of 31 December 2019, 408 people lived there. It has an area of 2.8 kmÂ².All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Agra is next to these municipalities: Dumenza, Luino, Maccagno con Pino e Veddasca. == Demographic change == Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey value:gray(0.7) id:sfondo value:rgb(1,1,1)
